page.title: 04Test for cornering:vehicles
page.content: Army trucks at the Ministry of Defence are driven onto a platform.This platform lifts from one side very gradually.The trucks are chained to the platform.This test is to see how many degrees the truck can tilt,before its wheels come away from the platform. The trucks also have to pass through deep water before they pass the test.This is to check for leaks,and faulty equipment.The trucks also go through different, some bumpy and some very dusty. Speed is another thing the trucks are tested for. Only when the trucks have passed all the tests, they can be used.
